medical_history.chief_complaint: History of fever and ascending limb paralysis for 3 days, with difficulty breathing for one day.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began with fever and ascending limb paralysis over 3 days, followed by one day of difficulty breathing. Pain in the legs preceded weakness in the lower limbs. Symptoms progressed to significant respiratory distress requiring intubation and mechanical ventilation. Improvement noted by Day 3, but complications developed, including ventilator-associated pneumonias.
